name: Flyflow
long_description:
"Flyflow is miles better than Twilio IVR"  - Digital Marketing Customer

Flyflow brings your brand to life with human-like AI support agents. When human agents are not available or affordable, our customers use Flylow-powered voice support to answer their customersâ€™ questions. We provide AI trained on company-specific knowledge, triggers to escalate to human-agents, automatic actions (like email and scheduling), and best-in-class conversation quality. 

How are we different?
(1) Incredibly easy to set up: get up and running in under an hour with a phone number your customers can call right away.
(2) Configurable: get access to all the knobs and dials so that you can create an experience that feels natural to your customers
(3) Best-in-class conversation quality: end-pointing, interruption handling, and latency reduction all built in-house
(4) Easy transition from IVR and call-center support: purpose-built for use cases like customer support and lead qualification
one_liner: AI-powered phone support that beats IVR and human agents
